00028 #ifndef __D3D11HARDWAREVERTEXBUFFER_H__
00029 #define __D3D11HARDWAREVERTEXBUFFER_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgreD3D11Prerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreHardwareVertexBuffer.h"
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00037     class D3D11HardwareVertexBuffer : public HardwareVertexBuffer 
00038     {
00039     protected:
00040         D3D11HardwareBuffer* mBufferImpl;
00041         // have to implement these, but do nothing as overridden lock/unlock
00042         void* lockImpl(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options) {return 0;}
00043         void unlockImpl(void) {}
00044 
00045     public:
00046         D3D11HardwareVertexBuffer(HardwareBufferManagerBase* mgr, size_t vertexSize, size_t numVertices, 
00047             HardwareBuffer::Usage usage, D3D11Device & device, bool useSystemMem, bool useShadowBuffer, 
00048             bool streamOut);
00049         ~D3D11HardwareVertexBuffer();
00050 
00051         // override all data-gathering methods
00052         void* lock(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00053         void unlock(void);
00054         void readData(size_t offset, size_t length, void* pDest);
00055         void writeData(size_t offset, size_t length, const void* pSource,
00056             bool discardWholeBuffer = false);
00057 
00058         void copyData(HardwareBuffer& srcBuffer, size_t srcOffset, 
00059             size_t dstOffset, size_t length, bool discardWholeBuffer = false);
00060         bool isLocked(void) const;
00061 
00063         bool releaseIfDefaultPool(void);
00065         bool recreateIfDefaultPool(D3D11Device & device);
00066 
00068         ID3D11Buffer * getD3DVertexBuffer(void) const;
00069     };
00070 
00071 }
00072 #endif
